SEARCH
Module OOP
Package OOPProject

Interface PatientAppointmentManagement

public interface PatientAppointmentManagement
The PatientAppointmentManagement interface defines methods to manage patient appointments, including viewing appointment outcomes, scheduling, canceling, rescheduling, and viewing available appointments.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    cancelAppointment(Patient patient, Appointment appointment)
    Cancels an existing appointment for a specific patient.
    Appointment
    rescheduleAppointment(Patient patient, AppointmentSlot appointment, AppointmentSlot newSlot)
    Reschedules an existing appointment for a patient to a new appointment slot.
    void
    scheduleAppointment(Patient patient, AppointmentSlot slot)
    Schedules a new appointment for a specific patient in the specified appointment slot.
    List<AppointmentOutcome>
    viewAppointmentOutcome(Patient patient)
    Retrieves the list of appointment outcomes for a specific patient.
    List<AppointmentSlot>
    viewAvailableAppointment()
    Retrieves a list of available appointment slots.

  • Method Details

    • viewAppointmentOutcome

      List<AppointmentOutcome> viewAppointmentOutcome(Patient patient)
      Retrieves the list of appointment outcomes for a specific patient.
      Parameters:
      patient - The Patient whose appointment outcomes are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A List of AppointmentOutcome objects associated with the patient.

    • cancelAppointment

      void cancelAppointment(Patient patient, Appointment appointment)
      Cancels an existing appointment for a specific patient.
      Parameters:
      patient - The Patient whose appointment is to be canceled.
      appointment - The Appointment to be canceled.

    • scheduleAppointment

      void scheduleAppointment(Patient patient, AppointmentSlot slot)
      Schedules a new appointment for a specific patient in the specified appointment slot.
      Parameters:
      patient - The Patient for whom the appointment is to be scheduled.
      slot - The AppointmentSlot where the appointment is to be scheduled.

    • rescheduleAppointment

      Appointment rescheduleAppointment(Patient patient, AppointmentSlot appointment, AppointmentSlot newSlot)
      Reschedules an existing appointment for a patient to a new appointment slot.
      Parameters:
      patient - The Patient whose appointment is to be rescheduled.
      appointment - The AppointmentSlot to be rescheduled.
      newSlot - The new AppointmentSlot to which the appointment is to be rescheduled.
      Returns:
      The updated Appointment object with the new schedule.

    • viewAvailableAppointment

      List<AppointmentSlot> viewAvailableAppointment()
      Retrieves a list of available appointment slots.
      Returns:
      A List of AppointmentSlot objects that are available for booking.
